title: Elderly woman killed in Jatrabari road accident
body: An elderly woman was killed after being hit by a bus while crossing the road at Jatrabari in Dhaka on Saturday. The deceased, Anwara Begum, 65, a resident of the Ali area under Bandar in Narayanganj, had been living as a tenant at a house in Rasulpur Dhania Alam Saheb area, holding 299. The accident occurred around 1:30pm in the Jhatrabari area when a speeding bus struck her as she was crossing the road. She was rescued and took to the emergency department of Dhaka Medical College Hospital, where the on-duty doctor declared her dead around 2:00pm. Swapan Ahmed, a pedestrian who brought her to the hospital, said that the woman sustained severe injuries after being hit by the bus. Inspector Md Faruk, in-charge of the DMCH police outpost, said that the body had been kept at the hospital morgue and the matter had been reported to the concerned police station.
